title: Olav Kooij Wins after Wout van Aert Red Carpet in Stage 12 Bunch Sprint at Giro d’Italia
content:
After a few misses, Dutch sprinter ace Olav Kooij blasts to victory after perfect leadout from Wout van Aert. Isaac del Toro widens lead with time bonuses in a relatively quiet day at the Giro d'Italia.

Read the full article at Olav Kooij Wins after Wout van Aert Red Carpet in Stage 12 Bunch Sprint at Giro d’Italia on Velo.
author: ahood
